import React from 'react' import BtnRender from './BtnRender' function TankItem({tank, isAdmin, deleteTank, handleCheck}) { return (
{ isAdmin && handleCheck(tank._id)} /> }

{tank.title}

Numer Boczny: {tank.side_id}

) } export default TankItem
